1: To make a white_bed, you need 3 white_wool and 3 planks and 1 crafting_table.
2: To make a planks, you need 1 log.
3: To make a stone_pickaxe, you need 2 stick and 3 cobblestone and 1 crafting_table.
4: To make a stick, you need 2 planks.
5: To make a iron_pickaxe, you need 2 stick and 3 iron_ingot and 1 crafting_table.
6: To make a iron_ingot, you need 1 raw_iron and 1 furnace.
7: To make a crafting_table, you need 4 planks.
8: To make a cooked_beef, you need 1 beef and 1 furnace.
9: To make a wooden_pickaxe, you need 3 planks and 2 stick.
10: To craft a furnace, you need 8 cobblestone and 1 crafting_table.
